Verses: 1 vevukaarar Kaanbiththa Vazhiyaaga Isravelar Varugiraargal Endru Therke Vaasampannugira Kaanaaniyanaagiya Aaraadh Raajaa Kelvippattapodhu, Avan Isravelarukku Virodhamaaga Yuththam Panni, Avargalil Silarai Siraipidiththukkonduponaan.
2 appozhudhu Isravelar Karththarai Nokki: Thevareer Indha Janangalai Engal Kaiyil Oppukkoduththaal, Avargaludaiya Pattanangalai Sangaaram Pannuvom Endru Pradhikkinaipanninaargal.

3 karththar Isravelin Saththaththukku Sevikoduththu, Avargalukkuk Kaanaaniyarai Oppukkoduththaar; Appozhudhu Avargalaiyum Avargal Pattanangalaiyum Sangaarampanni, Avvidaththirku Ormaa Endru Perittaargal.
4 avargal Edhom Dhesaththai Sutrippogumpadikku, Or Ennum Malaiyaivittu, Sivandha Samuththiraththin Vazhiyaaip Prayaanampanninaargal; Vazhiyinimiththam Janangal Manamadivadaindhaargal.

5 janangal Dhevanukkum Mosekkum Virodhamaagap Pesi: Naangal Vanaandharaththile Saagumpadi Neengal Engalai Egipthu Dhesaththilirundhu Varappanninadhenna? Inge Appamum Illai, Thanneerum Illai; Indha Arpamaana Unavu Engal Manadhukku Veruppaayirukkiradhu Endraargal.
6 appozhudhu Karththar Kollivaaichcharppangalai Janangalukkulle Anuppinaar; Avaigal Janangalaik Kadiththadhinaal Isravelarukkulle Anega Janangal Seththaargal.

7 adhinaal Janangal Moseyinidaththil Poi: Naangal Karththarukkum Umakkum Virodhamaaip Pesinadhinaal Paavancheydhom; Sarppangal Engalaivittu Neengumpadi Karththarai Nokki Vinnappam Pannavendum Endraargal; Mose Janangalukkaaga Vinnappam Panninaan.
8 appozhudhu Karththar Moseyai Nokki: Nee Oru Kollivaai Sarppaththin Uruvaththai Seydhu, Adhai Oru Kambaththinmel Thookkivai; Kadikkappattavan Evano Avan Adhai Nokkippaarththaal Pizhaippaan Endraar.
9 appadiye Mose Oru Vengala Sarppaththai Undaakki, Adhai Oru Kambaththinmel Thookkivaiththaan; Sarppam Oruvanaik Kadiththapodhu, Avan Andha Vengala Sarppaththai Nokkippaarththup Pizhaippaan.
10 isravel Puththirar Prayaanappattuppoi, Opoththil Paalayamiranginaargal.
11 opoththilirundhu Prayaanam Panni, Sooriyodhayaththirku Neraai Movaapukku Edhiraana Vanaandharaththilulla Apaareemin Medugalil Paalayamiranginaargal.
12 angeyirundhu Prayaanappattup Poi, Saaredh Pallaththaakkile Paalayamiranginaargal.

13 angeyirundhu Prayaanappattup Poi, Emoriyarin Ellaiyilirundhu Varugiradhum Vanaandharaththil Odugiradhumaana Arnon Aatrukku Ippuram Paalayamiranginaargal; Andha Arnon Movaapukkum Emoriyarukkum Naduve Irukkira Movaapin Ellai.
14 adhinaal Sooppaavilulla Vaakepum, Arnonin Aatrukkaalgalum,
15 aar Ennum Sthalaththukkup Paayum Neerodaiyum Movaapin Ellaiyai Saarndhirukkiradhu Ennum Vasanam Karththarudaiya Yuththa Pusthagaththil Ezhudhiyirukkiradhu.
16 angeyirundhu Peyerukkup Ponaargal; Janangalaik Koodivarachchey, Avargalukkuth Thanneer Koduppen Endru Karththar Mosekku Sonna Ootru Irukkira Idam Adhudhaan.
17 appozhudhu Isravelar Paadina Paattaavadhu: Ootruth Thanneere, Pongivaa; Adhaikkuriththup Paaduvom Vaarungal.
18 nyaayappramaanikkanin Evudhalaal Adhipadhigal Kinatraith Thondinaargal; Janaththil Menmakkal Thangal Thandaayudhangalaikkondu Thondinaargal Endru Paadinaargal.
19 andha Vanaandharaththilirundhu Maaththanaavukkum, Maaththanaavilirundhu Nakaaliyelukkum, Nakaaliyelilirundhu Paamoththukkum,
20 pallaththaakkilulla Movaapin Veliyil Irukkira Paamoththilirundhu Eshimonai Nokkum Piskaavin Uchchikkum Ponaargal.
21 appozhudhu Isravelar Emoriyarin Raajaavaagiya Seekonidaththil Sthaanaapadhigalai Anuppi:

22 umadhu Dhesaththin Vazhiyaaik Kadandhupogumpadi Uththaravu Kodukka Vendum; Naangal Vayalgalilum, Dhraatchaththottangalilum Pogaamalum, Thuravugalin Thanneeraik Kudiyaamalum, Umadhu Ellaiyaik Kadandhupogumattum Raajapaadhaiyil Nadandhupovom Endru Sollachchonnaargal.

23 seekon Than Ellaivazhiyaaik Kadandhupoga Isravelukku Uththaravu Kodaamal, Than Janangalellaaraiyum Koottikkondu, Isravelarukku Virodhamaaga Vanaandharaththile Purappattu, Yaagaasukku Vandhu, Isravelarode Yuththampanninaan.

24 isravelar Avanaip Pattayakkarukkinaal Vetti, Arnon Thodangi Ammon Puththirarin Dhesaththaichchaarndha Yaappokkuvaraikkumulla Avanudaiya Dhesaththaik Kattikkondaargal; Ammon Puththirarin Ellai Aranippaanadhaayirundhadhu.
25 isravelar Andhap Pattanangal Yaavaiyum Pidiththu, Esponilum Adhai Saarndha Ellaak Kraamangalilum Emoriyarudaiya Ellaappattanangalilum Kudiyirundhaargal.

26 esponaanadhu Emoriyarin Raajaavaagiya Seekonin Pattanamaayirundhadhu; Avan Movaapiyarin Mundhina Raajaavukku Virodhamaaga Yuththampanni, Arnon Varaikkum Irundha Avan Dhesaththaiyellaam Avan Kaiyilirundhu Pariththukkondaan.
27 adhinaale Kavikattugiravargal: Esponukku Vaarungal; Seekonin Pattanam Sthiramaaik Kattappaduvadhaaga.
28 esponilirundhu Akkiniyum Seekonudaiya Pattanaththilirundhu Juvaalaiyum Purappattu, Movaapudaiya Aar Ennum Ooraiyum, Arnonudaiya Medugalilulla Aandavamaargalaiyum Patchiththadhu.
29 aiyo, Movaape, Kemosh Dhevanin Janame, Nee Naasamaanaai; Thappi Odina Than Kumaararaiyum Than Kumaaraththigalaiyum Emoriyarin Raajaavaagiya Seekonukku Siraigalaaga Oppukkoduththaan.
30 avargalai Eydhupottom; Espon Pattanam Theepon Oorvaraikkum Naasamaayitru; Medhepaavukku Sameebamaana Noppaa Pattanapariyandham Avargalaip Paazhaakkinom Endru Paadinaargal.
31 isravelar Ippadiye Emoriyarin Dhesaththile Kudiyirundhaargal.
32 pinbu, Mose Yaaser Pattanaththukku Vevu Paarkkiravargalai Anuppinaan; Avargal Adhaichcherndha Graamangalaik Kattikkondu, Ange Irundha Emoriyaraith Thuraththivittaargal.

33 pinbu Paasaanukkup Pogira Vazhiyaaith Thirumbivittaargal; Appozhudhu Paasaan Raajaavaagiya Ok Enbavan Than Samastha Janangalodum Avargalai Edhirththu Yuththampannumpadikku, Edhreyukkup Purappattu Vandhaan.

34 karththar Moseyai Nokki: Avanukkup Bayappadavendaam; Avanaiyum Avan Janangal Ellaaraiyum, Avan Dhesaththaiyum Un Kaiyil Oppukkoduththen; Esponile Vaasamaayirundha Emoriyarin Raajaavaagiya Seekonukku Nee Seydhapadiye Ivanukkum Seyvaai Endraar.
35 appadiye Oruvarum Uyirudan Meedhiyaayiraadhapadikku Avanaiyum, Avan Kumaararaiyum, Avanudaiya Sagala Janangalaiyum Vettippottu, Avan Dhesaththaik Kattikkondaargal.
